parser

Class SCParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.SCParser

  • public class SCParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses the Source Code. Builds a TokenizedPixel list by taking in an input file, scans it into lines, tokenizes it, and adds it to the list token by token.
    Author:
    Triston Scallan

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.List<TokenizedPixel> pixelList
      the arrayList of TokenizedPixel type to construct a BitBlock
      private java.util.List<java.lang.String> tokenList
      the arrayList of tokens of a single expression

      • recursiveTokenize

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> recursiveTokenize(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> tempList,
                                                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> newList,
                                                               int done)
        Takes in a line of strings from tempList and recursively builds a list of more concise tokens.
        Parameters:
        tempList - the list it tokenizes from.
        newList - the list it tokenizes to.
        done - a value that tells the function when it's finished
        Returns:
        an arraylist of strings, the tokenized version of tempList

      • LiteralsToPixels

        public void LiteralsToPixels(java.lang.String token)
        Takes a whole token and breaks it into a series of chars and adds it to the pixel list.
        Parameters:
        token - a single word string representing a lingual piece of source code
